name: Hardfest
summary: Greetings mortals, Hardfest is a community project that is an homage to the Slaughterfest saga, not fully focused on slaughter maps this time, but hard maps in general. To that end, we've got a range of maps for you - ranging in style from small, tight combat puzzles to expansive slaughtermaps. There's also a puzzle map and a platforming map thrown in for good measure.
